backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with storage, access control, and types for customers, invoices, services, photos, and work orders, plus query methods for user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing files, components, and tests related to deployment error handling and retry support.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists pre‑generated summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, data handling, and diagnostics.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens and theming variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with bootstrap shims, default Internet Identity URL, favicon links, and React root mount.
frontend/src/api/backendClient.ts: Provides error normalization utilities detecting stopped-canister and authorization errors, producing structured AppError objects with technical details.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines React Query cache keys for customers, invoices, services, and work orders.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theming, error boundary, bootstrap gate, and AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main layout with header, navigation buttons for all sections, content wrapper, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/AsyncState.tsx: Provides a wrapper component to display loading, error (with technical details), empty, or content states.
frontend/src/components/BootstrapGate.ts: Blocks rendering until Internet Identity initialization completes, showing loading or error via AsyncState.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Renders the application's branded header with logo, title, and tagline.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorBoun: A React error boundary that catches startup errors and displays details with an option to copy technical info.
frontend/src/config/invoiceAssets.ts: Exports paths and metadata for invoice logo and watermark assets.
frontend/src/config/invoiceBranding.ts: Defines static business address, payment instructions, and optional text number for invoice branding.
frontend/src/features/customers/Customer: Dialog component that loads and displays customer details with loading, error, and not-found states.
Form component for creating or updating customer records with validation and mutation handling.
Main customer management page with list display, add/edit dialogs, and detail viewing using AsyncState.
React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating customers via the backend actor API.
frontend/src/features/customers/types.ts: Defines customer form data structure and a helper to convert backend customers into form data.
frontend/src/features/invoices/blobStora: Handles client-side image upload by converting files to base64 data URLs and returning them for display.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceDe: Invoice detail view handling display, payments, photo management, and editing for a single invoice.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceFo: Form for creating or updating invoices, including validation and line item management.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoiceLi: Editor for invoice line items with service selection, input fields, and per‑item updates.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoicePh: Dialog that displays a full‑size preview of an invoice photo loaded from blob storage.
Section for uploading, previewing, and removing before/after invoice photos with progress handling.
frontend/src/features/invoices/InvoicesP: Main invoices page listing all invoices and providing dialogs for creating and editing them.
frontend/src/features/invoices/photoType: Defines image upload state and validation utilities, including supported types and size limits.
frontend/src/features/invoices/queries.t: Provides invoice and customer React Query hooks plus create and update invoice mutations with data parsing.
frontend/src/features/invoices/ServiceSe: Provides a popover-based searchable dropdown for selecting a service, including a 'None' option.
frontend/src/features/invoices/SignInReq: Displays a card prompting the user to sign in via Internet Identity, showing a loading state during login.
frontend/src/features/invoices/types.ts: Defines invoice form types and helpers for currency, percentages, totals, and converting invoice data for forms.
frontend/src/features/landing/LandingPag: Renders the main landing page with navigation cards for customers, invoices, work orders, and services.
frontend/src/features/reports/invoiceRep: Provides helpers for converting bigint invoice timestamps to Date objects and checking if an invoice falls within a date range.
frontend/src/features/reports/InvoicesRe: Implements filters for invoice reports including status, customer, and date range with a clear-all option.
Renders the invoices report page, handling authentication, data loading, filters, and passing filtered data to the report content component.
frontend/src/features/services/importPar: Parses CSV/TSV service data into structured rows with validation for required fields and currency formatting.
frontend/src/features/services/queries.t: Provides React Query hooks for listing, reading, creating, updating, and bulk‑importing services via the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/services/ServiceBu: Implements a dialog for bulk importing services via pasted text or uploaded files, showing parsed previews and handling import mutations.
frontend/src/features/services/ServiceEd: Form for editing an existing service, validating input, formatting currency, and submitting updates via mutation.
Page for loading a service by ID and rendering the edit form with loading/error states and navigation handling.
frontend/src/features/services/ServiceIt: Form for creating a new service with validation and mutation submission, resetting fields on success.
frontend/src/features/services/ServicesP: Main services listing page with add/import dialogs, data loading states, and navigation to edit individual services.
frontend/src/features/services/types.ts: Defines form and import row types for services plus helpers for parsing and formatting currency values.
frontend/src/features/workOrders/queries: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and modifying work orders and related customer data.
frontend/src/features/workOrders/types.t: Provides form data types and helpers to convert between form data, backend inputs, and serialized notes.
frontend/src/features/workOrders/WorkOrd: UI dialog for creating a work order with validation, customer selection, and backend submission.
Displays and edits a work order, handling loading states, photo operations, and form synchronization.
Manages uploading, previewing, and deleting work order photos with validation and progress tracking.
Form component for editing detailed work order fields including instrument info and tuning data.
Displays the work orders list with authentication gating, async states, and navigation to individual work orders.
Shows a sign-in prompt UI using Internet Identity when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthStatus.ts: Returns whether the user is authenticated along with initialization state and identity info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements the Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identities, delegation validation, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables including light/dark palettes and invoice watermark styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s current ICP app state, features, architecture notes, known issues, and generated assets metadata.
